Package eu.opends.trigger

Class TriggerAction

java.lang.Object
eu.opends.trigger.TriggerAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
AddPlannerEventTriggerAction, ChangeLaneODCarTriggerAction, ChangeVehicleLayoutTriggerAction, DetachGeometryByTexturePathTriggerAction, GetTimeUntilBrakeTriggerAction, GetTimeUntilSpeedChangeTriggerAction, ManipulateObjectTriggerAction, ManipulatePictureTriggerAction, MoveTrafficTriggerAction, OpenInstructionsScreenTriggerAction, PauseSoundTriggerAction, PauseTriggerAction, PlayMovieTriggerAction, PlayNextMovieTriggerAction, PlaySoundTriggerAction, PresentationTaskTriggerAction, ReportSpeedTriggerAction, ReportTextTriggerAction, ReportTrafficLightTriggerAction, RequestGreenTrafficLightTriggerAction, ResetCarToResetPointTriggerAction, ResumeTriggerAction, SendMessageTriggerAction, SendNumberToParallelPortTriggerAction, SetActiveReferenceObjectTriggerAction, SetAutoPilotTriggerAction, SetCrosswindTriggerAction, SetFuelConsumptionTriggerAction, SetMotorwayTaskStimulusTriggerAction, SetODCarTargetLaneTriggerAction, SetOpenDSGaugeTriggerAction, SetSpeedLimitTriggerAction, SetTVPTStimulusTriggerAction, SetupBrakeReactionTimerTriggerAction, SetupContreTaskTriggerAction, SetupKeyReactionTimerTriggerAction, SetupLaneChangeReactionTimerTriggerAction, SetupSteeringReactionTimerTriggerAction, SetWeatherTriggerAction, ShutDownSimulationTriggerAction, StartReactionMeasurementTriggerAction, StartRecordingTriggerAction, StopMovieTriggerAction, StopRecordingTriggerAction, StopSoundTriggerAction, WarningFrameTriggerAction, WriteToKnowledgeBaseTriggerAction
public abstract class TriggerAction
extends java.lang.Object
This abstract class represents a trigger action, which will be performed whenever a collision with the related trigger was detected.
Author:
Rafael Math
